entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 6:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 16.8°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: 9.2°C
Wind: WNW 33 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming east 30 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon then west 30. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
